rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：40%新诊断心力衰竭患者同时患有房颤盐湖城 Intermountain Health 的研究人员进行的一项新研究发现，40% 的新诊断心力衰竭患者还患有心房颤动，研究人员发现这是一种心脏疾病的组合，会导致患者的预后明显较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-4025-of-newly-diagnosed-heart-failure- Patients-also-have-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-4025-of-newly-diagnosed-heart-failure- Patients-also-have-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dcf2661-7366-4692-8514-feb7752a57a9 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 07:03:03 -0500 Study: 40% of newly diagnosed heart failure patients also have atrial fibrillation
新型布美他尼鼻喷雾剂有望治疗心力衰竭根据今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上发表的最新科学成果，布美他尼药物的一种新型鼻喷雾剂可以像标准口服和静脉注射药物制剂一样有效地减少心力衰竭引起的组织肿胀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-nasal-spray-form-of-bumetanide-shows-promise-for-heart-failure-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-nasal-spray-form-of-bumetanide-shows-promise-for-heart-failure-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9908787-82c4-48c4-a428-400fa912045a Tue, 19 Nov 2024 06:59:00 -0500 New nasal spray form of bumetanide shows promise for heart failure treatment
密歇根州立大学研究人员开发出利用血液蛋白进行早期疾病检测的方法医学专业人士早就知道，越早发现疾病，患者获得更好治疗效果的机会就越大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/MSU-researchers-develop-method-for-earlier-disease-detection-using-blood- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/MSU-researchers-develop-method-for-earlier-disease-detection-using-blood- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2679c254-7682-4e69-a84e-d3e134065ff3 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 06:55:44 -0500 MSU researchers develop method for earlier disease detection using blood proteins
抗肥胖药物在减肥之外有望改善心血管健康根据美国心脏病学会旗舰期刊《JACC》上发表的几篇新论文，流行的抗肥胖药物继续显示出除减肥之外的心血管益处，这些论文同时在美国心脏协会的 2024 年科学会议上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Anti-obesity-drugs-show-promise-in-improving-cardioangiography-health-beyond-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Anti-obesity-drugs-show-promise-in-improving-cardioangiography-health-beyond-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99f3f766-dd82-46ee-91aa-948686d3bf89 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 06:46:55 -0500 Anti-obesity drugs show promise in improving cardiovascular health beyond weight loss
在化疗中添加高剂量静脉注射维生素 C 可提高胰腺癌患者的生存率一项随机 2 期临床试验的结果表明，在化疗中添加高剂量静脉注射 (IV) 维生素 C 可使晚期转移性胰腺癌患者的总生存期从 8 个月延长至 16 个月，翻倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Adding-high-dose-IV-vitamin-C-to-chemotherapy-can-boost-survival-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Adding-high-dose-IV-vitamin-C-to-chemotherapy-can-boost-survival-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef9ba125-219f-488d-ba33-0338ad2c6aef Tue, 19 Nov 2024 06:43:06 -0500 Adding high-dose IV vitamin C to chemotherapy can boost survival for pancreatic cancer patients
新的鼻疫苗可以帮助阻止百日咳的传播随着美国百日咳病例的增加，杜兰大学开发的一种新型鼻疫苗可能是减少这种高度传染性呼吸道疾病传播的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-nasal-vaccine-could-help-stop-the-spread-of-whooping-cough.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-nasal-vaccine-could-help-stop-the-spread-of-whooping-cough.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2003ed9c-18b3-4736-bef4-10ab35d97cdf Tue, 19 Nov 2024 06:34:02 -0500 New nasal vaccine could help stop the spread of whooping cough
研究发现家庭分娩和分娩中心分娩具有同等安全性俄勒冈州立大学研究人员领导的一项全国性研究表明，在低风险怀孕中，计划在家分娩的母亲和孩子与计划生育中心分娩一样安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-finds-equal-safety-in-home-and-birth-center-births.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-finds-equal-safety-in-home-and-birth-center-births.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b487fec-8bbd-42b0-b14b-aad3a60caf78 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 06:26:32 -0500 Study finds equal safety in home and birth center births
药物发现和给药中大问题的小解决方案Ijeoma Uchegbu 在 ELRIG Drug Discovery 2024 上讨论了纳米医学在提高药物依从性和开发非成瘾性疼痛缓解解决方案方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Small-Solutions-for-Big-Problems-in-Drug-Discovery-and-Delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Small-Solutions-for-Big-Problems-in-Drug-Discovery-and-Delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f27417b-91a6-4549-a3f1-ecd3c1f3f10c Tue, 19 Nov 2024 06:10:00 -0500 Small Solutions for Big Problems in Drug Discovery and Delivery
压力、饮食和血管健康：可可黄酮醇有帮助吗？加入富含黄酮醇的食物可以抵消压力引起的血管损伤，为改善心血管健康提供饮食策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Stress-diet-and-angio-health-Can-cocoa-flavonols-help.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Stress-diet-and-angio-health-Can-cocoa-flavonols-help.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01bf6dce-8f98-4654-9cb1-51aad9100bdb Tue, 19 Nov 2024 06:06:00 -0500 Stress, diet, and vascular health: Can cocoa flavonols help?
Stilla Technologies 与 Source BioScience 为英国市场带来先进的基因组学解决方案数字 PCR (dPCR) 解决方案的全球领导者 Stilla Technologies 宣布与英国领先的基因组学服务提供商 Source BioScience 建立战略合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Stilla-Technologies-with-Source-BioScience-brings-advanced-genomics-solutions-to-the-UK-market.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Stilla-Technologies-with-Source-BioScience-brings-advanced-genomics-solutions-to-the-UK-market.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dd31cb6-9f15-4c86-9a45-f25cb6b9c927 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 05:56:00 -0500 Stilla Technologies with Source BioScience brings advanced genomics solutions to the UK market
